arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss hails 'best yet' display as Huddersfield Town beaten
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney admitted Wigan Athletic's first-half performance in the 2-1 home victory over promotion-chasing Huddersfield Town as 'as good as anything we've produced this season'.

arts.ttl: Dale Taylor and Owen Dale on target as Wigan beat high-flying Huddersfield
arts.sum: Wigan came flying out of the blocks with Dale having a shot tipped over the crossbar by former Latics stopper Lee Nicholls.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic deservedly see off high-flying Huddersfield Town
arts.sum: First-half goals from Dale Taylor and Owen Dale gave Wigan Athletic three precious – and hugely deserved – three points thanks to a 2-1 victory over Huddersfield Town.

arts.ttl: Team news: Wigan Athletic v Huddersfield Town
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney has made two changes to his Wigan Athletic side for the visit of Huddersfield Town.

arts.ttl: Former Wigan Athletic man swaps Aberdeen for Hibernian
arts.sum: Former Wigan Athletic midfielder Jamie McGrath has already played his last game for Aberdeen after Hibernian announced a pre-contract agreement to sign the Republic of Ireland international this summer.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Two changes in our expected team v Huddersfield Town!
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start against Huddersfield Town at the Brick Community Stadium on Tuesday night.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss Shaun Maloney clarifies stance on free agent additions
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic boss Shaun Maloney has said they will not be ‘looking’ at the free agent market. Wigan… The post Wigan Athletic boss Shaun Maloney clarifies stance on free agent additions appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Shaun Maloney lifts lid on Wigan Athletic's failure to bring in a No.9 on transfer deadline day - and why he won't be looking at the free agent market
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney has revealed Wigan Athletic tried and failed to bring in a centre-forward on transfer deadline day.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic introduce new area to lure back stayaway fans
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic have confirmed the introduction of a ‘Warm Matchday Area’ at the Brick Community Stadium.

arts.ttl: Former Wigan Athletic star joins coaching staff at MLS side
arts.sum: Former Wigan Athletic star Roger Espinoza has joined Sporting Kansas City as a professional development coach and first-team assistant coach.
